replies.body:
This just makes me want to see a Worldbreaker skin for Morde.

Side note: This would likely only be possible in the training tool mode since there is no way to reset his ult that fast.......except maybe URF (depending on the ults cooldown)
And I thought Sylas was big after getting a bunch of stacks from using Cho'Gath's ult then using Shyvana's ult...
I'm pretty sure the CD resetting option in the practice tool specifically says that it can cause issues.
its not a bug his ult steals enemy size
Can we just leave this bug in? I'm sure no one will disagree since it can only be used in the practice tool.
